body:
Hey guys, 

First post so I dont know how it goes around these parts but, I recently got ARK: Survival Evolved. And I was just wondering if anyone else had it, because there has to be at least another person who has it and is willing to play with me. So if you do have it and are bored enough to play the game with me, say so below. If you dont have it, its around $24 now on Steam for sale, so I wouldn't wait to get it. 

-SenseiTechUS

title: ARK: Survival Evolved, anyone up for it?

replies.body: It looks quite good actually. Might consider it.
replies.body_tagged: It looks quite good actually. Might consider it.

replies.body: I want it pretty bad. Please gimme friends.
replies.body_tagged: I want it pretty bad. Please gimme friends.

replies.body: I wish I could Enflaming, was pretty lucky to get it myself.
